name: auto-reviewer
description: A full-stack application for automated content review using AI

scripts.dev:backend: cd back && source ../venv/bin/activate && python -m uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.install:backend: cd back && source ../venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend

author: Auto Reviewer Team
